text: We are a non-profit organization engaged in education and organization of events in the fields of gastronomy and culture. In particular, we focus on organizing the Brno speciality coffee festival ROAST. The organizing team is composed of Brno baristas, bartenders, enthusiasts for quality gastronomy and equally from musicians, actors and other members of the cultural community.
